sql.sql: select a.xzdjxh, a.SLSWJGDM, a.shxydm, a.swsswsmc, a.ssfwjgzzxs_dm, a.zxswhhrhfddbrxm, a.jycs, b.xgyy_dm,a.sldxzqh_dm, b.sxwxsj as djrq from sf_swsswsxzdj a, SF_SSJGXZDJSXWXB b where a.xzdjxh = b.xzdjxh and a.SLSWJGDM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.SSFWJGZZXS_DM = ?) and trunc(b.sxwxsj) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND a.zfbz_1 = ? and a.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM = ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM SF_SSZYFWJGZZB WHERE SSZYFWJGXH = ? AND CLRQ IS NULL ORDER BY LRRQ DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
select t.xzqhsz_dm,t.xzqhmc from dm_gy_xzqh t where xzqhjc =? start with t.xzqhsz_dm =? connect by prior t.sjxzqhsz_dm = t.xzqhsz_dm

SELECT JG1.SSZYFWJGXH, JG1.SSFWJGUUID, GLB.ZTGLUUID,A.JGHFUUID FROM SF_SSFWJGXX JG1,SF_SSZYFWJGZTGLB GLB, (SELECT HFB.SSZYFWJGXH, MAX(HFB.LRRQ) ,HFB.JGHFUUID FROM SF_SSZYFWJGHFB HFB, SF_SSFWJGXX JG WHERE HFB.HFRQ_1 <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND HFB.SSZYFWJGXH = JG.SSZYFWJGXH AND HFB.CLRQ IS NULL AND (HFB.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ? AND JG.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ?) AND JG.YXBZ = ? AND JG.ZYFWJGZFBZ = ? GROUP BY HFB.SSZYFWJGXH,HFB.JGHFUUID) A WHERE JG1.SSZYFWJGXH = A.SSZYFWJGXH AND JG1.SSZYFWJGXH = GLB.SSZYFWJGXH AND GLB.YXQZ IS NULL AND JG1.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ? AND JG1.YXBZ = ? AND JG1.ZYFWJGZFBZ = ? AND JG1.SJGSDQ = ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.* FROM SF_SSZYFWJGZZB A WHERE A.SSZYFWJGXH = ? ORDER BY LRRQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
select t.* from sf_ssfwryrzxxb t where t.ryxh=? and t.ssfwrycyqk_Dm=?

SELECT JG1.SJGSDQ FROM SF_SSFWJGXX JG1, (SELECT HFB.SSZYFWJGXH, MAX(HFB.LRRQ) FROM SF_SSZYFWJGHFB HFB, SF_SSFWJGXX JG WHERE HFB.HFRQ_1 <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND HFB.SSZYFWJGXH = JG.SSZYFWJGXH AND HFB.CLRQ IS NULL AND (HFB.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ? AND JG.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ?) AND JG.YXBZ = ? AND JG.ZYFWJGZFBZ = ? GROUP BY HFB.SSZYFWJGXH) A WHERE JG1.SSZYFWJGXH = A.SSZYFWJGXH AND JG1.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ? AND JG1.YXBZ = ? AND JG1.ZYFWJGZFBZ = ? GROUP BY JG1.SJGSDQ
select a.ryxh from sf_ssfwryrzxxb a,sf_sszyfwryxxb_zsxx b where a.ryxh = b.ryxh and a.sszyfwjgxh = ? and b.zyzgzslx_dm = ?
select a.sszyfwzxbgbh from sf_sszyfwzxbgb a where a.wtxyxxcjbh=?;

SELECT JG1.SJGSDQ FROM SF_SSFWJGXX JG1, (SELECT ZZB.SSZYFWJGXH, MAX(ZZB.LRRQ) FROM SF_SSZYFWJGZZB ZZB, SF_SSFWJGXX JG WHERE ZZB.ZZRQQ <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ZZB.SSZYFWJGXH = JG.SSZYFWJGXH AND ZZB.CLRQ IS NULL AND (ZZB.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ? AND JG.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ?) AND JG.YXBZ = ? AND JG.ZYFWJGZFBZ = ? GROUP BY ZZB.SSZYFWJGXH) A WHERE JG1.SSZYFWJGXH = A.SSZYFWJGXH AND JG1.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ? AND JG1.YXBZ = ? AND JG1.ZYFWJGZFBZ = ? GROUP BY JG1.SJGSDQ
select t.* from SF_SSJGZZB t where t.lcslid=?
select a.swsswsmc as ssjgmc,a.* from sf_swsswsxzdj a where a.xzdjxh in (select b.xzdjxh from sf_ssjgzfsxx b where b.sjxzdjxh = ? and b.yxbz = ? and b.xzdjxh !=? ) and a.zfbz_1 = ?
select a.ffrq,a.swzjzl_dm,a.swzjhm,a.swzjglzt_dm,a.lrr_dm,a.lrrq from sf_xzdjzjjcxx a where a.lcslid = ? and a.swzjzl_dm = ? and a.yxbz = ?
select a.ndbguuid, a.nd, a.ndbgbh, a.sszyfwjgxh, a.sszyfwxypf, a.bnsfsdxzcf, a.bnsfsdhyxhcj, a.gzlx_dm, a.gsjk, a.qtsm, a.ssqy_dm from sf_sszyfwndbgb a where a.sszyfwjgxh=? and a.zfbz_1=?

SELECT T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, SUM(T.GDSWSRS) swsrsgd, SUM(T.GDLSRS) lsrsgd, SUM(T.GDKJSRS) kjsrsgd, (SUM(T.GDSWSRS) + SUM(T.GDLSRS) + SUM(T.GDKJSRS)) ggrshj, SUM(T.QTSWSRS) swsrsqt, SUM(T.QTLSRS) lsrsqt, SUM(T.QTKJSRS) kjsrsqt, (SUM(T.QTSWSRS) + SUM(T.QTLSRS) + SUM(T.QTKJSRS)) qtcyrshj, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH,T.sldxzqh_dm, T.zzrq as djrq FROM (SELECT XZ.SHXYDM, XZ.SWSSWSMC, XZ.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, XZ.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, XZ.JYCS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDKJSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTKJSRS, XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, XZ.Slswjgdm, XZ.XZDJXH,XZ.sldxzqh_dm, zz.zzrq FROM SF_SWSSWSXZDJ XZ, SF_SWSSWSRYXX RY, sf_ssjgzzb zz WHERE XZ.XZDJXH = RY.XZDJXH and xz.xzdjxh = zz.xzdjxh AND XZ.zfbz_1 = ? AND zz.zfbz_1 = ? AND RY.YXBZ(+) = ? and XZ.SLSWJGDM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or XZ.SSFWJGZZXS_DM = ?) and zz.zzrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM = ?) T GROUP BY T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH,T.sldxzqh_dm, T.zzrq

select * from sf_swsswsryxx a where a.xzdjxh = ? and (1= ? or a.rylbbz = ?) and (1= ? or a.yxqq <= to_date(?,?)) and (1= ? or a.yxqz >= to_date(?,?)) and (1= ? or a.sfzjzl_dm = ?) and (1= ? or a.xm like ?) and (1= ? or a.sfzjhm like ?)

select t.xzdjxh, t.xzdjdabh, t.shxydm, t.swsswsmc as ssjgmc, t.ssfwjgzzxs_dm, t.zxswhhrhfddbrxm, t.jycs, t.ywfw, t.lxrxm, t.lxdh, t.sfyzszrd, t.gszgswj_dm, t.gszgswskfj_dm, t.slrq, t.slr, t.djrq,t.spjg, t.lcslid, t.swdjxh, t.ssfwjgxzdjzt_dm, t.spjg, t.zfs_bs, t.xzqhsz_dm from sf_swsswsxzdj t where shxydm=? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, ?) = ? order by lrrq desc

select a.zxbguuid, a.sszyfwjgxh, a.wtxyxxcjbh, a.sszyfwzxbgbh, a.ysszyfwzxbgbh, a.jsje_1, a.ywwcrq, a.fwqkzy, a.gzlx_dm, a.jbr, a.jsr_dm, a.jsrq, a.jsswjg_dm from sf_sszyfwzxbgb a, sf_sszyfwzxbg_wtxm b where a.zxbguuid = b.zxbguuid and a.wtxyxxcjbh = ? and b.sszyfwwtxm_dm in (?) and a.zfbz_1 = ?

SELECT JG1.SSZYFWJGXH, JG1.SSFWJGUUID, GLB.ZTGLUUID,A.JGZZUUID FROM SF_SSFWJGXX JG1, SF_SSZYFWJGZTGLB GLB, (SELECT ZZB.SSZYFWJGXH, MAX(ZZB.LRRQ) ,ZZB.JGZZUUID FROM SF_SSZYFWJGZZB ZZB, SF_SSFWJGXX JG WHERE ZZB.ZZRQQ <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ZZB.SSZYFWJGXH = JG.SSZYFWJGXH AND ZZB.CLRQ IS NULL AND (ZZB.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ? AND JG.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ?) AND JG.YXBZ = ? AND JG.ZYFWJGZFBZ = ? GROUP BY ZZB.SSZYFWJGXH,ZZB.JGZZUUID) A WHERE JG1.SSZYFWJGXH = A.SSZYFWJGXH AND JG1.SSZYFWJGXH = GLB.SSZYFWJGXH AND GLB.YXQZ IS NULL AND JG1.SSZYJGDJZT_DM = ? AND JG1.YXBZ = ? AND JG1.ZYFWJGZFBZ = ? AND JG1.SJGSDQ = ?
select zfs.* from SF_SSJGZFSXX zfs where zfs.sjxzdjxh = ? and zfs.yxbz = ?

select t.uuid, t.xzdjxh, t.xm, t.sfzjzl_dm, t.sfzjhm, t.zyzgzslx_dm, t.zyzgzssj, t.zyzgzsbh, t.hyxhhybh, t.yxbz, t.rylbbz, t.yxqq, t.yxqz from sf_swsswsryxx t where t.xzdjxh=? and t.rylbbz=? and yxbz=?

select a.xzdjxh, a.SLSWJGDM, a.shxydm, a.swsswsmc, a.ssfwjgzzxs_dm, a.zxswhhrhfddbrxm, a.jycs, b.xgyy_dm, b.sxwxsj from sf_swsswsxzdj a, SF_SSJGXZDJSXWXB b, SF_SSJGGGQC c where c.xzdjxh = a.xzdjxh and a.xzdjxh = b.xzdjxh and trunc(c.ggrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM = ? and c.ggbz = ? and a.zfbz_1 = ? and c.GGJG_DM = ? and c.gglx_dm=?
select a.zxbguuid, a.sszyfwjgxh, a.wtxyxxcjbh, a.jsje_1, a.ywwcrq, a.fwqkzy, a.sszyfwwtxmdl_dm from sf_sszyfwzxbgb a where a.sszyfwzxbgbh=? and a.zfbz_1=?
select * from sf_sszyfwxy_fwxm where wtxyxxcjbh=?
select * from SF_SSJGBGB a where a.lcslid = ? and a.xzdjxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = ?
select dj.* from sf_swsswsxzdj dj,SF_SSJGZFSXX zfs where zfs.xzdjxh = dj.xzdjxh and zfs.sjxzdjxh = ? and zfs.yxbz = ? and dj.ssfwjgxzdjzt_dm = ? and dj.spjg is null

select t.xzdjxh, t.xzdjdabh, t.shxydm, t.swsswsmc as ssjgmc, t.ssfwjgzzxs_dm, t.zxswhhrhfddbrxm, t.jycs, t.ywfw, t.lxrxm, t.lxdh, t.sfyzszrd, t.gszgswj_dm, t.gszgswskfj_dm, t.slbmyj, t.slrq, t.slr, t.djrq, t.lcslid, t.swdjxh, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.spjg, t.zfs_bs, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.ssfwjgxzdjzt_dm, t.slr_dm, t.slswjgdm, t.dszgswj_dm, t.dszgswskfj_dm from sf_swsswsxzdj t where t.lcslid=?
select t.uuid, t.gsuuid, t.yynr, t.yytcr, t.dcjg_bz from sf_gsyymxxx t where t.lcslid=? and yxbz=?
select t.* from sf_ssfwryrzxxb t where t.sszyfwjgxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ryxh= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ssfwrycyqk_Dm= ?)
select t.uuid, t.xzdjxh, t.gskssj, t.gsjssj, t.gsqk_bz from sf_swsswsxzdjgsb t where t.lcslid=?
select t.xzqhsz_dm,t.xzqhmc from dm_gy_xzqh t where xzqhjc =? start with t.xzqhsz_dm =? connect by prior t.sjxzqhsz_dm = t.xzqhsz_dm
select t.xzqhsz_dm, t.xzqhmc from dm_gy_xzqh t where t.xzqhjc = ? and t.xybz = ? and t.yxbz = ? and t.xzqhsz_dm not in (#macroparam#)
update sf_swsswsryxx set yxbz = 'N',xgr_dm = ?,xgrq = ? where xzdjxh = ?
select * from sf_ssjgzfsxx a where a.xzdjxh = ? and a.yxbz = ?

SELECT T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, SUM(T.GDSWSRS) swsrsgd, SUM(T.GDLSRS) lsrsgd, SUM(T.GDKJSRS) kjsrsgd, (SUM(T.GDSWSRS) + SUM(T.GDLSRS) + SUM(T.GDKJSRS)) gdrshj, SUM(T.QTSWSRS) swsrsqt, SUM(T.QTLSRS) lsrsqt, SUM(T.QTKJSRS) kjsrsqt, (SUM(T.QTSWSRS) + SUM(T.QTLSRS) + SUM(T.QTKJSRS)) qtcyrshj, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH, T.lrrq as djrq FROM (SELECT XZ.SHXYDM, XZ.SWSSWSMC, XZ.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, XZ.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, XZ.JYCS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDKJSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTKJSRS, XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, XZ.Slswjgdm, XZ.XZDJXH, bg.lrrq FROM SF_SWSSWSXZDJ XZ, SF_SWSSWSRYXX RY, sf_ssjgbgb bg WHERE XZ.XZDJXH = RY.XZDJXH and xz.xzdjxh = bg.xzdjxh AND xz.zfbz_1 = ? AND bg.zfbz_1 = ? AND RY.YXBZ(+) = ? and XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM = ? and EXISTS (select 1 from SF_SSJGGGQC c where c.xzdjxh = XZ.Xzdjxh and trunc(c.ggrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.ggbz = ? and c.GGJG_DM = ? and c.gglx_dm = ?)) T GROUP BY T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH, T.lrrq

with bg as (SELECT xzdjxh, lrrq FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY xzdjxh ORDER BY lrrq DESC) rn, xzdjxh, lrrq FROM sf_ssjgbgb a where a.zfbz_1 = ? and a.lrrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) WHERE rn = 1) SELECT T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, SUM(T.GDSWSRS) swsrsgd, SUM(T.GDLSRS) lsrsgd, SUM(T.GDKJSRS) kjsrsgd, (SUM(T.GDSWSRS) + SUM(T.GDLSRS) + SUM(T.GDKJSRS)) ggrshj, SUM(T.QTSWSRS) swsrsqt, SUM(T.QTLSRS) lsrsqt, SUM(T.QTKJSRS) kjsrsqt, (SUM(T.QTSWSRS) + SUM(T.QTLSRS) + SUM(T.QTKJSRS)) qtcyrshj, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH,T.sldxzqh_dm, T.lrrq as djrq FROM (SELECT XZ.SHXYDM, XZ.SWSSWSMC, XZ.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, XZ.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, XZ.JYCS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDKJSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTKJSRS, XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, XZ.Slswjgdm, XZ.XZDJXH,XZ.sldxzqh_dm, bg.lrrq FROM SF_SWSSWSXZDJ XZ, SF_SWSSWSRYXX RY,bg WHERE XZ.XZDJXH = bg.XZDJXH and bg.xzdjxh = RY.xzdjxh AND XZ.zfbz_1 = ? AND RY.YXBZ(+) = ? and XZ.SLSWJGDM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or XZ.SSFWJGZZXS_DM = ?) AND XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM = ?) T GROUP BY T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH,T.sldxzqh_dm, T.lrrq

SELECT T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, SUM(T.GDSWSRS) swsrsgd, SUM(T.GDLSRS) lsrsgd, SUM(T.GDKJSRS) kjsrsgd, (SUM(T.GDSWSRS) + SUM(T.GDLSRS) + SUM(T.GDKJSRS)) gdrshj, SUM(T.QTSWSRS) swsrsqt, SUM(T.QTLSRS) lsrsqt, SUM(T.QTKJSRS) kjsrsqt, (SUM(T.QTSWSRS) + SUM(T.QTLSRS) + SUM(T.QTKJSRS)) qtcyrshj, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH, T.zzrq as djrq FROM (SELECT XZ.SHXYDM, XZ.SWSSWSMC, XZ.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, XZ.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, XZ.JYCS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDKJSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTKJSRS, XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, XZ.Slswjgdm, XZ.XZDJXH, zz.zzrq FROM SF_SWSSWSXZDJ XZ, SF_SWSSWSRYXX RY, sf_ssjgzzb zz WHERE XZ.XZDJXH = RY.XZDJXH and xz.xzdjxh = zz.xzdjxh AND xz.zfbz_1 = ? AND zz.zfbz_1 = ? AND RY.YXBZ(+) = ? and zz.spjg = '1' AND XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM = ? and EXISTS (select 1 from SF_SSJGGGQC c where XZ.Xzdjxh = c.xzdjxh and trunc(c.ggrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.ggbz = ? and c.GGJG_DM = ? and c.gglx_dm = ?)) T GROUP BY T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH, T.zzrq
select a.ffrq,a.swzjzl_dm,a.swzjhm,a.swzjglzt_dm,a.lrr_dm,a.lrrq from SF_XZDJZJJCXX a where a.xzdjxh = ? and a.yxbz = ?
select t.uuid, t.sjshxydm, t.sjssjgmc, t.sjxzdjxh, t.shxydm, t.ssjgmc, t.xzdjxh from sf_ssjgzfsxx t where t.uuid=? and t.yxbz=?
select a.swsswsmc as ssjgmc,a.* from sf_swsswsxzdj a where a.xzdjxh = ?
select t.* from sf_sszyfwryxxb t where t.sfzjzl_dm=? and t.zjhm=?

select a.* from SF_SSZYFWJGGG a where a.ggjg_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or a.gglx_dm = ?) and a.yxbz = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or (a.ggrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1 = #macroparam# or (a.ggrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) order by a.ggrq desc

select b.xm, b.sfzjzl_dm, b.sfzjhm,a.swsswsmc from sf_swsswsryxx b, sf_ls_zjandzjhm c, sf_swsswsxzdj a where b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.sfzjzl_dm = c.sfzjzl_dm and b.sfzjhm = c.sfzjhm and a.xzdjxh = b.xzdjxh and a.ssfwjgxzdjzt_dm = ? and a.xzdjxh not in(#macroparam#)
select a.* from sf_ssjgbgmxb a, sf_ssjgbgb b where b.swsswsbguuid = a.swsswsbguuid and b.xzdjxh = ? and a.bgxm_dm = ? order by a.lrrq desc

select t.xzdjxh, t.xzdjdabh, t.shxydm, t.swsswsmc as ssjgmc, t.ssfwjgzzxs_dm, t.zxswhhrhfddbrxm, t.jycs, t.ywfw, t.lxrxm, t.lxdh, t.sfyzszrd, t.gszgswj_dm, t.gszgswskfj_dm, t.slrq, t.slr, t.djrq, t.lcslid, t.swdjxh, t.zfbz_1, t.ssfwjgxzdjzt_dm, t.spjg, t.zfs_bs, t.xzqhsz_dm from sf_swsswsxzdj t where shxydm=? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zfs_bs = ? ) and t.ssfwjgxzdjzt_dm=? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, ?) = ?
select t.xzdjxh,t.swsswsmc as ssjgmc from sf_swsswsxzdj t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.shxydm=? ) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.swsswsmc=?) and t.ssfwjgxzdjzt_dm=?
select * from SF_SSJGBGMXB a where a.swsswsbguuid = ?
select t.* from sf_ssfwjgxx t where t.shxydm = ? and t.Zyfwjgzfbz = ? and t.yxbz = ?
select a.* from SF_SSZYFWJGGGQC a where a.gguuid=?
select * from Sf_Xzdjrybgmxb a where a.swsswsbguuid = ? and a.RYLBBZ = ?
select b.* from sf_sszyfwxyxxb b where b.strdjxh=? and b.sszyfwxyzxqk_dm=? and ((to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') between b.fwqxq and b.fwqxz) )
select b.wtxmuuid, b.zxbguuid, b.sszyfwwtxm_dm, b.ywje from sf_sszyfwzxbgb a, sf_sszyfwzxbg_wtxm b where a.sszyfwzxbgbh=? and a.zxbguuid=b.zxbguuid
select a.swsswsmc as ssjgmc,a.* from sf_swsswsxzdj a where a.xzdjxh in (select b.sjxzdjxh from sf_ssjgzfsxx b where b.xzdjxh = ? and b.yxbz = ? and b.sjxzdjxh != ?) and a.zfbz_1 = ?
select t.* from sf_ssfwjgxx t where t.swdjxh= ? and t.Zyfwjgzfbz = ?
select zs.* from sf_sszyfwryxxb_zsxx zs where zs.ryxh=?

select rz.jgrygluuid,rz.sszyfwjgxh,rz.lzrq,rz.sfdzbsjdzfzr,rz.rylbbz,rz.ywlc_dm,rz.rzrq_2,rz.ssfwryjgnsf,rz.sszyfwrycyqk,rz.ssfwrycyqk_dm,ry.* from sf_ssfwryrzxxb rz,sf_sszyfwryxxb ry where rz.ryxh= ry.ryxh and ry.ryuuid=?

select rz.jgrygluuid,rz.sszyfwjgxh,rz.lzrq,rz.sfdzbsjdzfzr,rz.rylbbz,rz.ywlc_dm, rz.rzrq_2,rz.ssfwryjgnsf,rz.sszyfwrycyqk,rz.ssfwrycyqk_dm,ry.* from sf_ssfwryrzxxb rz,sf_sszyfwryxxb ry where rz.ryxh= ry.ryxh and rz.sszyfwjgxh=? and (1 = #macroparam# or rz.ssfwrycyqk_dm = ?)

SELECT T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, SUM(T.GDSWSRS) swsrsgd, SUM(T.GDLSRS) lsrsgd, SUM(T.GDKJSRS) kjsrsgd, (SUM(T.GDSWSRS) + SUM(T.GDLSRS) + SUM(T.GDKJSRS)) ggrshj, SUM(T.QTSWSRS) swsrsqt, SUM(T.QTLSRS) lsrsqt, SUM(T.QTKJSRS) kjsrsqt, (SUM(T.QTSWSRS) + SUM(T.QTLSRS) + SUM(T.QTKJSRS)) qtcyrshj, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH,T.sldxzqh_dm, T.djrq FROM (SELECT XZ.SHXYDM, XZ.SWSSWSMC, XZ.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, XZ.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, XZ.JYCS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '01' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GDKJSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '39' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTSWSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTLSRS, (CASE WHEN RY.RYLBBZ = '02' AND RY.ZYZGZSLX_DM = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTKJSRS, XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, XZ.Slswjgdm, XZ.XZDJXH,XZ.sldxzqh_dm, XZ.djrq FROM SF_SWSSWSXZDJ XZ, SF_SWSSWSRYXX RY WHERE XZ.XZDJXH = RY.XZDJXH AND XZ.zfbz_1 = ? AND RY.YXBZ(+) = ? and XZ.SLSWJGDM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or XZ.SSFWJGZZXS_DM = ?) and XZ.djrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND XZ.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM = ? ) T GROUP BY T.SHXYDM, T.SWSSWSMC, T.SSFWJGZZXS_DM, T.ZXSWHHRHFDDBRXM, T.JYCS, T.SSFWJGXZDJZT_DM, T.Slswjgdm, T.XZDJXH, t.sldxzqh_dm, T.djrq
select * from sf_sszyfwxyxxb where wtxyxxcjbh=? and sszyfwxyzxqk_dm=?
select t.uuid, t.sjshxydm, t.sjssjgmc, t.sjxzdjxh, t.shxydm, t.ssjgmc, t.xzdjxh from sf_ssjgzfsxx t where t.xzdjxh=? and t.yxbz=?
select dj.* from sf_swsswsxzdj dj,SF_SSJGZFSXX zfs where zfs.xzdjxh = dj.xzdjxh and zfs.sjxzdjxh = ? and zfs.yxbz = ? and dj.ssfwjgxzdjzt_dm = ?
select a.zxbguuid, a.sszyfwjgxh, a.wtxyxxcjbh, a.sszyfwzxbgbh from sf_sszyfwzxbgb a where a.sszyfwwtxmdl_dm = ? and a.wtxyxxcjbh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = ?
select c.zxbgryuuid, c.zxbguuid, c.ryxh, c.xmnsf from sf_sszyfwzxbgb a, sf_sszyfwzxbg_ryxx c where a.sszyfwzxbgbh=? and a.zxbguuid=c.zxbguuid
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM SF_SSZYFWJGHFB WHERE SSZYFWJGXH = ? ORDER BY LRRQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM SF_SSZYFWJGZTGLB WHERE SSZYFWJGXH = ? AND YXQZ IS NULL ORDER BY LRRQ DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

select b.* from sf_sszyfwxyxxb a,sf_sszyfwxy_fwxm b where a.xyuuid=b.xyuuid and b.wtrdjxh=? and (1 = #macroparam# or a.wtxyxxcjbh != ? ) and a.sszyfwxyzxqk_dm=? and ((to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') between a.fwqxq and a.fwqxz) or (to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') between a.fwqxq and a.fwqxz))
select t.uuid, t.xzdjxh, t.xm, t.sfzjzl_dm, t.sfzjhm, t.zyzgzslx_dm, t.zyzgzssj, t.zyzgzsbh, t.hyxhhybh, t.yxbz, t.rylbbz, t.yxqq, t.yxqz from sf_swsswsryxx t where t.lcslid=? and t.rylbbz=?
select a.ffrq, a.swzjzl_dm, a.swzjhm, a.swzjglzt_dm, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq from sf_xzdjzjjcxx a where a.xzdjxh = ? and a.swzjzl_dm = ? and a.swzjglzt_dm = ? and a.yxbz = ?
